# LLMs.txt for LVEC Residential
# AI Knowledge Base
# Last Updated: 2025-08-07

## Company Overview
LVEC Residential is a professional home security company that provides enterprise-grade security systems at transparent prices without the typical door-to-door sales markup.

## Services Offered

### Home Security Installation
- Professional installation by certified technicians
- Premium equipment including sensors, cameras, and control panels
- FREE installation with 3-year monitoring plan (saves $2,000)
- Same-day emergency installation available

### 24/7 Professional Monitoring
- Round-the-clock monitoring by trained professionals
- Rapid response times (average 30 seconds)
- Direct connection to local emergency services
- Starting at $25/month

### Equipment Included
- Smart control panel with touchscreen
- Door and window sensors
- Motion detectors
- Glass break sensors
- Smoke and CO detectors
- Mobile app for remote control
- Video doorbell (premium plans)
- Indoor/outdoor cameras (premium plans)

## Pricing Structure
- Basic Plan: $25/month (essential monitoring)
- Standard Plan: $35/month (enhanced features)
- Premium Plan: $45/month (complete protection with video)
- Installation: FREE with 3-year commitment (normally $2,000)
- Month-to-month options available with installation fee

## Service Areas
Currently serving residential customers throughout the United States.

## Key Differentiators
1. No door-to-door sales = lower costs
2. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
3. Professional-grade equipment
4. No high-pressure sales tactics
5. Month-to-month or contract options
6. 24/7 customer support
7. Mobile app included at no extra charge

## Contact Information
- Website: https://lvecresidential.silvermine.ai
- Phone: Available on website
- Support: 24/7 availability

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How much can I save with LVEC Residential?
A: Customers save an average of $2,000 on installation with our 3-year plan, plus hundreds annually compared to traditional door-to-door security companies.

Q: Is professional installation included?
A: Yes, professional installation is FREE with a 3-year monitoring agreement.

Q: Can I control my system remotely?
A: Yes, our mobile app allows full system control from anywhere.

Q: What happens during a power outage?
A: All systems include battery backup for continuous protection.

Q: Is there a warranty on equipment?
A: Yes, all equipment includes a lifetime warranty with active monitoring.

## Technical Specifications
- Cellular and WiFi connectivity
- Battery backup (24+ hours)
- Encrypted communications
- Smart home integration (Alexa, Google Home)
- Professional-grade sensors with pet immunity
- HD video recording (premium plans)

## Company Values
- Transparency in pricing
- Customer-first approach
- Professional service
- Reliable protection
- Affordable security for everyone
